          <title>
            <string language="en">Methane and treacle tin bomb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Methan- und Melassezinnbombe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Panne de bidon de méthane et de mélasse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bomba da lata do methane e do treacle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bomba della latta della melassa e del metano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βόμβα κασσίτερου μεθανίου και treacle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bomba de la lata del metano y de la melaza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This series of illustrations shows the process of making a treacle tin bomb using methane.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Reihe Abbildungen zeigt den Prozeß des 
Bildens einer Melassezinnbombe mit Methan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette série d'illustrations montre le processus 
de faire une panne de bidon de mélasse en utilisant le méthane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta série das ilustrações mostra o processo de
fazer uma bomba da lata do treacle usando o methane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa serie di illustrazioni mostra il processo 
di fare una bomba della latta della melassa usando il metano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σειρά απεικονίσεων εμφανίζει τη διαδικασία μια
treacle βόμβα κασσίτερου χρησιμοποιώντας το μεθάνιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta serie de ilustraciones muestra el proceso de
hacer una bomba de la lata de la melaza usando el metano.</string>
          </description>
